description: Details of Piling Method Statement pursuant to Condition 19 of Planning Permission 174485FUL dated 26.11.2019 for 'Demolition of existing structure and erection of part 7, 9 and 13 storey building with double basement for use as student accommodation (use class sui generis) comprising up to 650 bed spaces, ground floor ancillary student facilities and study areas, cycle parking, plant, access and servicing,  landscaping and public realm, and basement/ground floor retail/caf√©/restaurant (class A1/A3) and gymnasium (class D2) commercial units.'
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The submitted Details of Piling Method Statement pursuant to Condition 19 of Planning Permission 174485FUL dated 26.11.2019, are deemed to be unsatisfactory and do not meet the requirements of the condition. The proposal would therefore fail to comply with policies 5.14 and 5.15 of the London Plan (2016).
